content: What do you like to do for fun?
I love to watch movies. I'm a big fan of science fiction and fantasy movies. What about you? Do you have any movies you like to watch?

Oh, I love the movie Blade Runner, it's one of my favorite movies! I live in Tampa and it was constantly playing in the theaters. I must have seen it 10 times in the theater. I also love the movie The Matrix. I'm a big fan of science fiction movies too!
